home.title: Home - Orion Express
home.description: Orion Express is your expert in road transport across Europe. Our freight forwarding services are tailored mainly for clients from the European Union, ensuring timely and secure delivery of various types of cargo.

aboutUs.title: About Us - Orion Express
aboutUs.description: Orion Express is a fast-growing logistics company offering comprehensive transport solutions across Europe. Our team of professionals ensures the efficient execution of every order.

gallery.title: Gallery - Orion Express
gallery.description: Explore our gallery to see how Orion Express delivers innovative transport solutions tailored to the needs of our clients.

career.title: Career - Orion Express
career.description: Advance your career with Orion Express! We offer attractive employment conditions, growth opportunities, and a dynamic work environment in the international logistics industry.

documents.title: Documents - Orion Express
documents.description: Find all the essential documents related to Orion Express, including transport forms, data protection policies, and banking documentation.

contact.title: Contact - Orion Express
contact.description: Have questions? Get in touch with Orion Express! We provide support for transport and logistics services. Check our contact details and inquiry form here.

csr.title: CSR - Orion Express
csr.description: Learn about Orion Expressâ€™s social responsibility initiatives and how we support sustainable development and corporate responsibility.

whoWeAre.title: Who are we?
whoWeAre.subtitle: OrionExpress is a group of specialists offering modern logistics solutions throughout Europe. During our work we take care to keep positive relations with our customers, as well as inside our company. It impacts directly into results at work and significant stable development.

localization.title: Our modern office
localization.subtitle: We are in the city center of Bydgoszcz. The office of our company is equipped with modern and ergonomic equipment, ensuring comfort and efficiency of work.

more.title: More about us
more.subtitle: Employee integration is a key element for us to build good relationships. Our team not only works together but also spends free time with each other. Thanks to our common interests, our time passes quickly and enjoyable.

career.text: Working at OrionExpress is an ideal opportunity for you to expand your transport offers or develop your freight forwarding skills. Cooperation in projects, an attractive remuneration system or constant expansion of your skills are just a few features that stand out our business.

form.title: Your contact details
form.note: If you want to join us, send your CV along with a cover letter to the address

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Contact the specialists of OrionExpress to discuss the details of cooperation. We will answer all your questions and clear your doubts about logistics transportation.
contact.teamTitle1: Need to get in contact with a person from our team?
contact.teamTitle2: Look at the full OrionExpress team.
